metadata.title: CVE-2016-6871 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in bcmath in Facebook HHVM before 3.15.0 allows attackersto have unspecified impact via unknown vectors, which triggers a bufferoverflow.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
